coffees.name: Brewed Coffee
coffees.desc: Brewed coffee is made by pouring hot water onto ground coffee beans, then allowing to brew.

coffees.name: White Mocha Coffee
coffees.desc: This is a white chocolate version of a classic mocha.

coffees.name: Cappuccino
coffees.desc: A type of coffee made with espresso and milk that has been frothed up with pressurized steam

coffees.name: Tea
coffees.desc: A hot drink made by infusing the dried crushed leaves of the tea plant in boiling water.
